Related repos

  • Interactive wallpapers with web technologies for Windows
  • Colorizes wallpapers with custom palettes using the browser Canvas API
  • Generates wallpapers with AI

  • Sets videos as desktop wallpapers

  • Sets wallpapers via cron job scheduler
